text: Simon Greul and Christopher Kas were the defending champions, but both chose to compete in Barcelona instead. Mario Ančić and Ivan Dodig won in the final 4–6, 7–6(8), [10–4], against Juan Pablo Brzezicki and Rubén Ramírez Hidalgo. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== * Main Draw Roma Open - Doubles 2010 Doubles
title: 2010 Roma Open – Doubles
